text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Does it matter if they missed the target by a few days,surely it's better to set a target of 100k & miss it by a few thousand,than set one you know you'll reach just to keep moaners quiet,a target is something to try to hit,the higher the target,the harder people try to reach it
